content: ------------------------------ there s a small error in row #8 there should be 1 chain on either side of the puff-stitch ------------------------------ this pattern produces a round textured carpet i used 2000 meters of cotton twine 3 mm thick and a 5 mm hook size h in the us to obtain a diameter of 160 cm you can use any yarn but remember one thing the crochet hook needs to be almost twice as thick as the yarn if you use a yarn of different thickness than my 3 mm cord then the diameter will change but i can t predict by how much this pattern was first published in polish on my blog as a cal countdown to winter i posted it in three parts * http //magiccarpetstudio blogspot com/2021/12/szydekowe-odliczanie-do-zimy-czesc-i html * http //magiccarpetstudio blogspot com/2021/12/szydekowe-odliczanie-do-zimy-czesc-ii html * http //magiccarpetstudio blogspot com/2021/12/szydekowe-odliczanie-do-zimy-czesc-iii html if any of the photos in the pdf file seem too small you can find their bigger originals on my blog
